title: why i cant use the emotes
body: i cant use the emotes i equipped them and keep pressing T still not working tried still the same

replies.body: What game mode are you using them in?  As long as you have it equipped it should work without issue, however, it's currently disabled in custom and practice tool games.

im using it in PvP draft normals and solo/duo ranked 

i keep pressing T and its not working

Thanks for the info!  To clarify for me, when you say equipped how did you do that?  Was it through your collections tab?  Can you toss me a screenshot?  I've heard some reports so I want to make sure everything is covered or if there's something going on.
im using it in PvP draft normals and solo/duo ranked
